description: Biographical and professional details of people involved in film and television. Includes actors, directors, writers, producers, etc.

columns.name: nconst
columns.description: Unique identifier for each individual in the database

columns.name: primaryName
columns.description: Person’s full name as known in the industry

columns.name: birthYear
columns.description: Year of birth in YYYY format, '\N' if not known

columns.name: deathYear
columns.description: Year of death in YYYY format, '\N' if still alive or unknown

columns.name: primaryProfession
columns.description: Comma-separated list of key professions (e.g., actor, director)

columns.name: knownForTitles
columns.description: Comma-separated list of IMDb title IDs most associated with the person

description: Alternate titles used for films and TV shows in different countries, regions, and languages. Useful for internationalization and localization.

columns.name: titleId
columns.description: IMDb ID of the title this record refers to

columns.name: ordering
columns.description: Ordering number for titles that share the same titleId

columns.name: title
columns.description: The alternate or localized title

columns.name: region
columns.description: Region where this title is used (e.g., US, DE)

columns.name: language
columns.description: Language of the title, using ISO codes

columns.name: types
columns.description: Comma-separated list indicating title type (e.g., 'original', 'alternative')

columns.name: attributes
columns.description: Additional information about the title (e.g., IMAX, DVD)

columns.name: isOriginalTitle
columns.description: 1 if this was the original release title, 0 otherwise

description: Master list of titles including movies, short films, TV episodes, and series. Contains general info like genre, release year, and runtime.

columns.name: tconst
columns.description: Unique IMDb identifier for the title

columns.name: titleType
columns.description: Type of the title (e.g., movie, short, tvSeries, tvEpisode)

columns.name: primaryTitle
columns.description: Title most commonly used by the public

columns.name: originalTitle
columns.description: Original language version of the title

columns.name: isAdult
columns.description: 1 if the title is adult content, 0 otherwise

columns.name: startYear
columns.description: Year of first release

columns.name: endYear
columns.description: Year the series/season ended, if applicable

columns.name: runtimeMinutes
columns.description: Length of the title in minutes, '\N' if unknown

columns.name: genres
columns.description: Comma-separated list of genres (e.g., Drama, Comedy)

description: Information about the creative leads for titles, specifically the directors and writers responsible for each film or show.

columns.name: tconst
columns.description: IMDb ID of the title

columns.name: directors
columns.description: Comma-separated IMDb IDs (nconst) for directors of the title

columns.name: writers
columns.description: Comma-separated IMDb IDs (nconst) for writers of the title

description: Details about episodes of television series including their relationship to parent series and episode order.

columns.name: tconst
columns.description: IMDb ID for the episode

columns.name: parentTconst
columns.description: IMDb ID for the parent series

columns.name: seasonNumber
columns.description: Season in which the episode aired

columns.name: episodeNumber
columns.description: Episode’s position within the season

description: Lists top-billed cast and crew members, usually shown prominently on a title's page. Indicates each person's role and characters played.

columns.name: tconst
columns.description: IMDb ID of the title

columns.name: ordering
columns.description: Order in which the person appears in credits

columns.name: nconst
columns.description: Person’s unique IMDb ID

columns.name: category
columns.description: Role category (e.g., actor, director, producer)

columns.name: job
columns.description: Specific job title or function (e.g., 'cinematographer')

columns.name: characters
columns.description: Names of characters played (if applicable)

description: Aggregate IMDb user ratings and vote counts for titles. Used to rank popularity and viewer sentiment.

columns.name: tconst
columns.description: IMDb ID of the title

columns.name: averageRating
columns.description: Average user rating on a scale of 1–10

columns.name: numVotes
columns.description: Number of votes the title has received
